question: Who has been ranked number one on the sixth Forbes India Celebrity 100 List?
explanation: Actor Salman Khan has been ranked number one on the sixth Forbes India Celebrity 100 List. Salman Khan was followed by Shah Rukh Khan and Virat Kohli in the 2nd and 3rd positions respectively. Actor Priyanka Chopra is the only female celebrity to make the top 10 list. The 2017 Forbes India Celebrity 100 List takes into account entertainment-related earnings of celebrities. The period considered was October 1, 2016 to September 30, 2017.
